PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-01212015-02-05,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Board of Directors of RITA NOTARANDREA of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Acting Chief Executive Officer of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse to hold office during pleasure until a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, effective February 26, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
